      • create

        public static InvoiceItem create(java.util.Map map)
                          throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                 AuthenticationException,
                                 InvalidRequestException,
                                 NotAllowedException,
                                 SystemException
        Creates an InvoiceItem object using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
        Parameters:
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the invoice item in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00 required
        java.lang.String description
        Individual items of an invoice [max length: 1024]
        java.lang.String invoice
        The ID of the invoice this item belongs to.
        java.lang.String product
        Product ID this item relates to.
        java.lang.Long quantity
        Quantity of the item. This total amount of the invoice item is the amount * quantity. [min value: 1, max value: 999999, default: 1]
        java.lang.String reference
        User defined reference field. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String tax
        The tax ID of the tax charge in the invoice item.
        Returns:
        a InvoiceItem object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

        @Deprecated
public static InvoiceItem create(java.lang.String publicKey,

                          throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                 AuthenticationException,
                                 InvalidRequestException,
                                 NotAllowedException,
                                 SystemException
        Deprecated. As of release 1.1, replaced by create(Authentication, Map)
        Creates an InvoiceItem object
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY will be used
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the invoice item in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00 required
        java.lang.String description
        Individual items of an invoice [max length: 1024]
        java.lang.String invoice
        The ID of the invoice this item belongs to.
        java.lang.String product
        Product ID this item relates to.
        java.lang.Long quantity
        Quantity of the item. This total amount of the invoice item is the amount * quantity. [min value: 1, max value: 999999, default: 1]
        java.lang.String reference
        User defined reference field. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String tax
        The tax ID of the tax charge in the invoice item.
        Returns:
        a InvoiceItem object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

      • create

        public static InvoiceItem create(Authentication auth,
                 java.util.Map map)
                          throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                 AuthenticationException,
                                 InvalidRequestException,
                                 NotAllowedException,
                                 SystemException
        Creates an InvoiceItem object
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication object representing overrides for PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY and PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and/or passing an access token in for operations using OAuth.
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the invoice item in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00 required
        java.lang.String description
        Individual items of an invoice [max length: 1024]
        java.lang.String invoice
        The ID of the invoice this item belongs to.
        java.lang.String product
        Product ID this item relates to.
        java.lang.Long quantity
        Quantity of the item. This total amount of the invoice item is the amount * quantity. [min value: 1, max value: 999999, default: 1]
        java.lang.String reference
        User defined reference field. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String tax
        The tax ID of the tax charge in the invoice item.
        Returns:
        a InvoiceItem object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
